about_the_game:
This Beekeeping DLC will allow you to install beehives on all farms of the base free game.
This DLC unlocks the following features :

New Research :


  • In all regions, the beehives are unlocked through the already existing Biodiversity research.

New infrastructure and actions:


  • The Hive: A new building site for "Hive" will become available
    Once installed, you will can perform the following new actions:
  • Improve: Expansion & Biomonitoring.
  • Colonization: Lay a queen in the hive for a colony to develop (possible action from March to September)
  • Harvest: The honey harvest is possible from August to October.
  • Maintenance: Cleaning the hive prevents disease and increases the yield of the colony (possible action from November to February.

New items to buy in the market


To take care of your new hive, it will be essential to acquire these new items available on the market:

  • Beekeeper Kit
  • Smoker
  • Centrifuge

BUY A DLC = SAVE THE BEES


Because Roots of Tomorrow is a game about agroecology, it was important to us to support the preservation of biodiversity.

This is why part of the income generated by the sales these DLCs will be donated to the non profit “Un toit pour les abeilles” (“A roof for bees”)

“Un Toit Pour Les Abeilles” is a network of nearly a hundred beekeepers who campaign for artisanal, local and bee-friendly beekeeping. For more than 10 years, the beekeepers of the network have been committed to safeguarding the bee, in particular through the sponsorship of beehives.
